name: Poofers the Fish
text: This card can attack directly. If this card inflicts battle damage: You can send 1 Reptile-type monster from your Deck to your GY and target 1 card on the field; banish it. If you sent a "Poofers" monster from your Deck to your GY to activate this effect, this card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase this turn. You can only control 1 "Poofers the Fish" during the Battle Phase. (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY; return up to 3 "Poofers Poofected" monsters from your GY to the Extra Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Poofers the Fish" once per turn.
